title: At least 14 weeks since last Urf...
body:
I don't know Riot but I think I am sensing something more than regular URF... why else would they delay it out of schedule? It's probably not URF skins since they come out on April 1st. It possibly could be a new feature or addition to the gamemode.

Maybe it is Riot trying to hype everyone up, but then again for me it would be more of a "finally". Then again it could be same old Riot with their unreasonable logic behind decisions. This isn't just what everyone wants, it's literally the most diverse and fun schedule, yet you just take it off and haven't said why.

This would be way better than whatever you have now:

Ascension
One For All
Nexus Siege
Ultra Rapid Fire
Definitely not Dominion
Legend of the Poro King

Don't know if I missed any but just put that on and maybe make some themed skins only available when the corresponding gamemode is on and you will see much more success.

replies.body: I'm just waiting for the doom bots.
